verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi became הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am And [when] the people כְּמִתְאֹ֣נְנִ֔ים <WH596> ke-mit-'O-ne-Nim, complained רַ֖ע <WH7451> ra' of adversity בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei the hearing יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> vai-Yi-char was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> ap-Po, [it] and his anger וַתִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> vat-tiv-'ar- burnt בָּם֙ bam אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh and the fire יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַתֹּ֖אכַל <WH398> vat-To-chal among them and consumed בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> bik-Tzeh [them that were] in the uttermost parts הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. of the camp
